p: We shown high incidence of viral infections in allo-HCT patients whereas in auto-HCT patients the incidence was episodic, comparably with other studies. 4, 5 This disproportion is a result of allogeneic source of stem cells, T-cell depletion or CD34 selection, moderate-to-severe GVHD and use of immunosuppressive drugs (especially steroids) in allo-HCT patients. 11
